name: dreamy

seeming to be in a dream and not paying attention to what is happening around you: She gets this dreamy expression on her face when she talks about food.
very pleasant or attractive: The movie opens with a dreamy shot of a sunset.old-fashioned He has these dreamy blue eyes.
